title: The NBA Finals is coming.  Morgan Freeman is in the news.  The Duke and Duchess of Sussex will have their honeymoon.  Weekend Confessions, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: The NBA Finals is coming.  Morgan Freeman is in the news.  The Duke and Duchess of Sussex will have their honeymoon.  Weekend Confessions, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Cavs VS Dubs again in the NBA Finals. Morgan Freeman issues an apology. Will The Royal Honeymoon be as lavish as the wedding? Weekend Confessions is back with Fool #1. One member of the crew got hacked. Another got their money's worth at the theater. Find out what Nephew Tommy had to say in today's Closing Remarks and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
